ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:37:25 [Issue ID 4000-39836] urn:comicvine:4000-39836 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 01:05:02. [Issue ID 55893]
ComicInfo.Summary:
A Zero Month crossover issue. With the death of over half of the Leymen after the events of Zero Hour, Doctor Mist, now calling himself Maltus, is in search for replacements. Using the clairvoyant abilities of his adopted daughter Christine, Maltus finds out that the evil creature Cataclysm has been reborn in the body of Harold Ross. Maltus wants his new Leymen to be super-heroes, and the lady of the water calls fine new Leymen: the Irish third-generation super-hero Jack O’Lantern; the Hong Kong martial artist Claw; the former Justice Leaguer Red Tornado, now just an empty shell; Ragman’s misunderstood enemy Golem; and a seemingly unremarkable woman named Meridian Mychaels. The five all find themselves brought via water to Maltus’ home, where the four of them think that Golem is an attacking creature.
Notes:
"DC Universe 20" one page Zero Hour advertisement featuring the front page of the Daily Planet with the headline "Zero Hour for Earth?" "DC Universe 21" a one page memorial dedicated to Neal Pozner. Artwork of three headshots of Neal by Phil Jimenez.

ComicInfo.Title: The Call
